ayahs.textUthmani: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَسْرَةِ إِذْ قُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ وَهُمْ فِى غَفْلَةٍ وَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ [And warn them] يَوْمَ [(of the) Day] ٱلْحَسْرَةِ [(of) the Regret] إِذْ [when] قُضِىَ [has been decided] ٱلْأَمْرُ [the matter] وَهُمْ [And they] فِى [(are) in] غَفْلَةٍۢ [heedlessness] وَهُمْ [and they] لَا [(do) not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [believe]
ayahs.transliteration: Waanthirhum yawma alhasrati ithqudiya al-amru wahum fee ghaflatin wahum layu/minoon

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَرِثُ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَنْ عَلَيْهَا وَإِلَيْنَا يُرْجَعُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] نَحْنُ [[We]] نَرِثُ [[We] will inherit] ٱلْأَرْضَ [the earth] وَمَنْ [and whoever] عَلَيْهَا [(is) on it] وَإِلَيْنَا [and to Us] يُرْجَعُونَ [they will be returned]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna nahnu narithu al-ardawaman AAalayha wa-ilayna yurjaAAoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ [Ibrahim] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] كَانَ [was] صِدِّيقًۭا [a man of truth] نَّبِيًّا [a Prophet]
ayahs.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabiibraheema innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لِمَ تَعْبُدُ مَا لَا يَسْمَعُ وَلَا يُبْصِرُ وَلَا يُغْنِى عَنكَ شَيْـًٔا
ayahs.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] قَالَ [he said] لِأَبِيهِ [to his father] يَـٰٓأَبَتِ [O my father] لِمَ [Why] تَعْبُدُ [(do) you worship] مَا [that which] لَا [not] يَسْمَعُ [hears] وَلَا [and not] يُبْصِرُ [sees] وَلَا [and not] يُغْنِى [benefits] عَنكَ [[to] you] شَيْـًۭٔا [(in) anything]
ayahs.transliteration: Ith qala li-abeehi yaabati lima taAAbudu ma la yasmaAAu wala yubsiruwala yughnee AAanka shay-a

ayahs.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّى قَدْ جَآءَنِى مِنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ مَا لَمْ يَأْتِكَ فَٱتَّبِعْنِىٓ أَهْدِكَ صِرَٰطًا سَوِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ [O my father] إِنِّى [Indeed, [I]] قَدْ [verily] جَآءَنِى [(has) come to me] مِنَ [of] ٱلْعِلْمِ [the knowledge] مَا [what] لَمْ [not] يَأْتِكَ [came to you] فَٱتَّبِعْنِىٓ [so follow me] أَهْدِكَ [I will guide you] صِرَٰطًۭا [(to) the path] سَوِيًّۭا [even]
ayahs.transliteration: Ya abati innee qad jaanee minaalAAilmi ma lam ya/tika fattabiAAnee ahdika siratansawiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعْبُدِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَصِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ [O my father] لَا [(Do) not] تَعْبُدِ [worship] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ [the Shaitaan] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ [the Shaitaan] كَانَ [is] لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [to the Most Gracious] عَصِيًّۭا [disobedient]
ayahs.transliteration: Ya abati la taAAbudi ashshaytanainna ashshaytana kana lirrahmaniAAasiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٌ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيْطَـٰنِ وَلِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ [O my father] إِنِّىٓ [Indeed, I] أَخَافُ [[I] fear] أَن [that] يَمَسَّكَ [will touch you] عَذَابٌۭ [a punishment] مِّنَ [from] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] فَتَكُونَ [so you would be] لِلشَّيْطَـٰنِ [to the Shaitaan] وَلِيًّۭا [a friend]
ayahs.transliteration: Ya abati innee akhafu anyamassaka AAathabun mina arrahmanifatakoona lishshyatani waliyya

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنْ ءَالِهَتِى يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ لَأَرْجُمَنَّكَ ۖ وَٱهْجُرْنِى مَلِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] أَرَاغِبٌ [Do you hate] أَنتَ [Do you hate] عَنْ [(from)] ءَالِهَتِى [my gods] يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ ۖ [O Ibrahim] لَئِن [Surely, if] لَّمْ [not] تَنتَهِ [you desist] لَأَرْجُمَنَّكَ ۖ [surely, I will stone you] وَٱهْجُرْنِى [so leave me] مَلِيًّۭا [(for) a prolonged time]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala araghibun anta AAan alihateeya ibraheemu la-in lam tantahi laarjumannaka wahjurneemaliyya

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكَ ۖ سَأَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِى حَفِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] سَلَـٰمٌ [Peace (be)] عَلَيْكَ ۖ [on you] سَأَسْتَغْفِرُ [I will ask forgiveness] لَكَ [for you] رَبِّىٓ ۖ [(from) my Lord] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] كَانَ [is] بِى [to me] حَفِيًّۭا [Ever Gracious]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala salamun AAalaykasaastaghfiru laka rabbee innahu kana bee hafiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ وَمَا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّى شَقِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ [And I will leave you] وَمَا [and what] تَدْعُونَ [you invoke] مِن [besides] دُونِ [besides] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] وَأَدْعُوا۟ [and I will invoke] رَبِّى [my Lord] عَسَىٰٓ [May be] أَلَّآ [that not] أَكُونَ [I will be] بِدُعَآءِ [in invocation] رَبِّى [(to) my Lord] شَقِيًّۭا [unblessed]
ayahs.transliteration: WaaAAtazilukum wama tadAAoona mindooni Allahi waadAAoo rabbee AAasa allaakoona biduAAa-i rabbee shaqiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: فَلَمَّا ٱعْتَزَلَهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَكُلًّا جَعَلْنَا نَبِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَلَمَّا [So when] ٱعْتَزَلَهُمْ [he left them] وَمَا [and what] يَعْبُدُونَ [they worshipped] مِن [besides Allah] دُونِ [besides Allah] ٱللَّهِ [besides Allah] وَهَبْنَا [[and] We bestowed] لَهُۥٓ [[to] him] إِسْحَـٰقَ [Isaac] وَيَعْقُوبَ ۖ [and Yaqub] وَكُلًّۭا [and each (of them)] جَعَلْنَا [We made] نَبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
ayahs.transliteration: Falamma iAAtazalahum wamayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi wahabna lahu ishaqawayaAAqooba wakullan jaAAalna nabiyya

ayahs.textUthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُم مِّن رَّحْمَتِنَا وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ عَلِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَوَهَبْنَا [And We bestowed] لَهُم [to them] مِّن [of] رَّحْمَتِنَا [Our Mercy] وَجَعَلْنَا [and We made] لَهُمْ [for them] لِسَانَ [a truthful mention] صِدْقٍ [a truthful mention] عَلِيًّۭا [high]
ayahs.transliteration: Wawahabna lahum min rahmatinawajaAAalna lahum lisana sidqin AAaliyya

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخْلَصًا وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] مُوسَىٰٓ ۚ [Musa] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] كَانَ [was] مُخْلَصًۭا [chosen] وَكَانَ [and was] رَسُولًۭا [a Messenger] نَّبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
ayahs.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabimoosa innahu kana mukhlasan wakanarasoolan nabiyya
